item.title: Daniels Random Events v1.53 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | February 23, 2025

Daniels Random Events v1.53 ATS

This mod adds over 600 different new random events to appear on the roads in ATS.
There are many different types of events ranging all the way from car accidents to asphalt patches and from trailer fires to breakdowns.
All of the events are dynamic in one way or another so they are slightly different each time they spawn.
All of the events have different rarity levels depending on the type of event so some events will spawn more often than others.
Different types of events have different rarity levels aswell so some events you will see more often than others.

Other Changes:
– Added a second white strip to the traffic cone and made the white strips retroreflective to make it more realistic and to make it easier to be seen at night time.
– Added collisions to the drain covers / channels.
– Added collisions to the asphalt patches.

Optional addon:
More Bumpy Asphalt Patches and Drain Covers Addon:
This optional addon will increase the amount of bumpy asphalt patches and drain covers you will encounter on the roads in ATS.

Tested for 1.53

Credits: danbywinby

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Jetbus 5 SA v2.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | February 23, 2025

Jetbus 5 SA v2.0 ETS2

The Jetbus 5 SA in Euro Truck Simulator 2 is a detailed and functional bus mod designed for versions 1.40 to 1.53 of the game. This working version offers a realistic driving experience with accurate interior and exterior designs, making it a great addition for players who enjoy passenger transport. It features customizable options, working lights, and smooth handling, ideal for urban and intercity routes. Perfect for bus enthusiasts, the Jetbus 5 SA adds variety and immersion to your virtual transportation fleet.

Credits: SA Product

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: Kia Tracomeco Granbird 2024 v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | February 23, 2025

Kia Tracomeco Granbird 2024 v1.0 ETS2

The Kia Tracomeco Granbird 2024 in Euro Truck Simulator 2 is a modern and highly detailed bus mod designed for game versions 1.50 to 1.53. This working version offers a realistic and immersive driving experience, featuring a sleek design, advanced interior details, and smooth handling. Ideal for players who enjoy passenger transport, it is perfect for both urban and long-distance routes. With customizable options and functional features, the Granbird 2024 adds a touch of realism and variety to your virtual fleet.

Credits: Vietnam Modders Fix © TeamGhost

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.

item.title: EXPANSION V15.5 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | February 23, 2025

EXPANSION V15.5 ATS

Changes v15.5
added Stephenvile TX
added Kiewit in Westcliffe
added Prairie Sand & Gravel Westcliffe
added KD Cattle Alamosa
added Stephenville Feedlot
added swather and KD cattlegate models
added Arco Feedlot
added Fort Worth Ranch
added Lander Ranch
added the cattle trailer washout in Salina back in
added Horse Traier model
added Melstone north-east of Billings with various companies
added horse models and 20ft Trailer model
added furniture store in Early
added Ryegate
various fixes

This mod adds over 200 loading/unloading locations from Montana, Idaho, Utah, Wyoming, Colorado, New Mexico, Oklahoma, Texas, Kansas and Nebraska. Custom garages scattered around the map and Many many ranches and farms added, but thats not all, from logging sites and crazy roads in Montana to custom wind farms at Judith Gap. New crude oil pickups in Wyoming, Oklahoma and Texas. Custom Volvo dealerships in Missoula, Killeen and Victoria. Custom home furniture curbside deliveries around the map to gas station grocery deliveries. The map has all this and more.

If using modded trailers add the cargo addon mod directly above ATS Expansion.
Nebraska is required as are all SCS state DLC’s, Volvo Construction DLC Forestry DLC and Heavy Cargo DLC
Compatibility: 1.53

Credits: xRECONLOBSTERx, Driver47, Sineptorro

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.
